name: RollUpView
wiql: select [System.WorkItemType], [System.Title], [System.State], [Microsoft.VSTS.Scheduling.OriginalEstimate], [Microsoft.VSTS.Scheduling.RemainingWork], [Microsoft.VSTS.Scheduling.CompletedWork], [Microsoft.VSTS.Scheduling.Effort], [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.BusinessValue], [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.ValueArea], [System.Tags] from WorkItemLinks where (Source.[System.WorkItemType] in ('Epic')) and (Source.[System.AreaPath] = '$ProjectID1$') and Source.[System.IterationPath] under '$ProjectID2$' and Source.[System.State] in ('New', 'Active', 'Resolved') and [System.Links.LinkType] = 'System.LinkTypes.Hierarchy-Forward' and ((Target.[System.WorkItemType] in ('Epic')) and (Target.[System.Id] > 0) and Target.[System.IterationPath] under '$ProjectID3$' and Target.[System.State] in ('New', 'Active', 'Resolved') or ((Target.[System.WorkItemType] in ('Feature')) and Target.[System.State] in ('New', 'Active', 'Resolved', 'Closed')) or ((Target.[System.WorkItemType] in ('User Story')) and Target.[System.State] in ('New', 'Active', 'Resolved', 'Closed')) or ((Target.[System.WorkItemType] in ('Task', 'Bug')) and Target.[System.State] in ('New', 'Active', 'Resolved', 'Closed'))) order by [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.StackRank] asc, [System.Id] asc mode (Recursive)
